title: Billie on Happier Than Ever (Spotify Commentary)
lyrics:
[Spoken Word]
"Happier Than Ever"! Probably the most therapeutic song I've ever written or recorded? Like, ever, ever, ever? 'Cause I just screamed my lungs out and could barely talk afterwards which was very satisfying to me somehow? I had wanted to get those screams out for a very long time. And it was very nice, too.
